results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: That dreaded phone call
results.creator_credit: Ruth Burleigh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ruth Burleigh reflects on the day she’ll have to make that dreaded call and put her beloved horse Boris ‘out to pasture’. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My car : my place
results.creator_credit: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Friendship in a biscuit tin
results.creator_credit: Vivianne Everett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vivianne Everett pays homage to her friend Vikki who has taught her awareness and acceptance, while celebrating a life long friendship that has stood the test of time. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Gold fever
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass, TV Ed Productions and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
results.brief_description: They came to get rich quickly and escape poverty in their homelands, but what they found was not always wealth. This program looks at life on the goldfields and discusses some of the problems that the diggers encountered. Sovereign Hill at Ballarat is featured.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, George Cass, TV Ed Productions and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
results.description: They came to get rich quickly and escape poverty in their homelands, but what they found was not always wealth. This program looks at life on the goldfields and discusses some of the problems that the diggers encountered. Sovereign Hill at Ballarat is featured.

results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
